privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: This Privacy Policy describes how CISVAN handles user information while using the platform. 1. Personal Data Currently, CISVAN does not request personal data such as name or address. However, future updates may enable registration via email in order to access additional features like rating content. In such cases, the email will be treated confidentially, not shared with third parties, and only used internally for authentication purposes. 2. Technical Data As part of the standard operation of any website, non-identifiable technical data such as browser type, operating system, screen resolution, or visit duration may be recorded. This data may be used anonymously to improve site performance and design. 3. Cookies CISVAN may use technical cookies necessary to remember user preferences, such as selected language. These cookies do not contain personal information and are not used for tracking or advertising purposes. 4. External Links The platform may contain links to external websites, such as TMDB or social networks. CISVAN has no control over their privacy policies and is not responsible for their content or practices. 5. Security While CISVAN is built using good web development practices, we cannot guarantee the complete security of transmitted or stored information due to the academic and experimental nature of the project. 6. Changes to this Policy This policy may be updated at any time. We recommend reviewing it periodically to stay informed about potential changes.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.content: What is CISVAN? CISVAN is a web platform that allows users to explore movies, series, and the people behind them. It’s inspired by sites like IMDb, but with a more modern, educational, and visually accessible approach. Where does the information come from? We use the public TMDB (The Movie Database) API to display information about titles, actors, and more. Who is behind this project? CISVAN is an independent, non-profit project created for educational and professional practice purposes. It was developed by a student passionate about web development and cinema. Can I use CISVAN in other languages? Yes. We currently support Spanish and English, and you can switch languages from the top menu. Where can I report bugs or send suggestions? You can use the contact section to send us your questions, suggestions, or error reports.

about.title: About CISVAN
about.content:
CISVAN is a web platform designed to provide an intuitive and engaging experience when exploring movies, series, and the talent behind them.

Our goal is not only to offer a space for browsing and viewing content, but also to allow users to express themselves, read, and discuss tastes, opinions, and critiques around audiovisual media.

Inspired by sites like IMDb, CISVAN integrates its own vision of design and usability to provide a modern alternative, built with technologies like React and Tailwind CSS.

CISVAN is an independent, non-profit project created for educational and experimental purposes. Our commitment is to continue improving the platform and adding new features to enhance the user experience.

This product uses the TMDB API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDB.
